Caitiff/Chordate:



Chordate heard the door of the bridge opened, and he turned to see the figure.
"Who are you?" he said, pressing a few buttons on the computer.

----

Caitiff arrived at the CF.  After scanners found his Maxi signature, he 
walked into the ship.  Looking around, the chimpanzee, knuckles on the metal 
ground, starting "running" around as he heard loud, fast paced footsteps 
belonging to Smokescreen.
